htmlgithubpages.ext.description: Convert the data so that the HTML/CSS layout is displayed correctly in Github Pages.
htmlgithubpages.task.nojekyll.root.label: Create a ".nojekyll" file in [workspaceFolder(./)]
htmlgithubpages.task.nojekyll.docs.label: Create a ".nojekyll" file in [./docs]
htmlgithubpages.task.nojekyll.docs.dir.n: The docs folder was not created.
htmlgithubpages.task.toHTML.label: Convert to HTML for GitHub Pages
htmlgithubpages.conf.converthtmlforgithu: Specify the data folder to be converted and the folder to be output.
